title: Is the 'fragment of 2,500-year-old musical instrument found in Scottish loch' the oldest piece of a musical instrument ever found in Europe? - Quora

response.answer_text: Not by a long way. There have been bone and ivory flute fragments found in various parts of Europe that are tens of thousands years old. The oldest is a 42,000 year old flute from Southern Germany: Earliest music instruments found 8 Oldest Musical Instruments in the World | Oldest.org
